name:  Tracking car motion

symbols:
   variables: [z,x,vx,y,vy]
   measurement_variables : [obs_z]
   shocks: [ex,ey]
   measurement_shocks : [ez]
   parameters: [dt]

equations:
    - z  = vx**2  + vy**2
    - x  = x(-1)  + vx*dt 
    - vx = vx(-1) + 0.1*dt + ex    
    - y  = y(-1)  + vy*dt
    - vy = vy(-1) + 0.2*dt + ey   
    
measurement_equations: 
    - obs_z = z + ez

calibration:
      # Parameters
      dt : 0.1
      # Initial values
      z : y/x
      x : 1
      vx : 0.1
      y : 1
      vy : 0.2 
      # Standard deviation of shocks
      std_ex : .1
      std_ey : .1
      # Standard deviations of measurement variables
      std_ez : .1
    
options:
    range : ["2000,1,1","2025,1,1"]
    filter_range : ["2000,1,1","2020,1,1"]
    frequency: 0 #yearly
